name: Elijah Arbee
title: passionate about data, 3d and ai models, and the potential of computing on a more connected, fair, and growth-friendly world

workExperience.title: Sales & Marketing
responsibilities: Co-founded and spearheaded sales operations for a door-to-door solar consultancy dealership.
Developed and executed comprehensive marketing campaigns to drive lead generation and sales.
Managed all aspects of sales operations, from prospecting and client acquisition to contract negotiation and closing deals.
Onboarded, trained, and mentored a team of 15+ sales representatives, fostering a culture of collaboration and high performance.
Leveraged data analysis and CRM systems to track sales metrics, identify growth opportunities, and optimize sales strategies.
workExperience.background: Gained invaluable experience in entrepreneurship, sales leadership, and data-driven decision-making while building and managing a solar energy consultancy. Navigated the complexities of a rapidly evolving market, adapting sales strategies and operational processes to achieve sustainable growth. Developed deep expertise in solar energy systems, energy efficiency solutions, and customer relationship management.

workExperience.title: Customer Service & Hospitality
responsibilities: Delivered exceptional customer service in fast-paced, high-volume dining and catering environments.
Mastered various roles, including server, caterer, food runner, and busser, demonstrating adaptability and a strong work ethic.
Collaborated effectively with teams to ensure seamless event execution and customer satisfaction.
Proactively resolved customer issues and maintained a positive and professional demeanor in challenging situations.
workExperience.background: Developed a strong foundation in customer service, communication, teamwork, and problem-solving through diverse hospitality roles. Cultivated a customer-centric approach and a commitment to exceeding expectations in demanding service environments.
